metadata.title: CVE-2023-32001 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
fopen race condition

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-32001` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

curl - 7.85.0-1ubuntu0.6
libcurl3-gnutls - 7.85.0-1ubuntu0.6
libcurl3-nss - 7.85.0-1ubuntu0.6
libcurl4 - 7.85.0-1ubuntu0.6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: curl package in kinetic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.85.0-1ubuntu0.6').
